description.en:
Toragurumi Araburu
A high school girl still sleeps with her stuffed animal tiger which was made by her grandma. She loves this tiger very much, however when she get's stressed she ends up beating up on the tiger. Suddenly the tiger has had enough and ends up coming to life!

Oni to Koi Gokko
A demon was trapped inside a stone but when an upset girl smashed a pot of sake all over it, the demon was released in child form. Only by drinking alcohol would the demon be restored to adult form, however he became curious about the girl who set him free.

Merry-Go-Round Drop
A angel girl dropped down to earth as a form of punishment to fix her ways. She meets a human boy and they become interested in each other, however another angel who likes the girl wants her to return with him.
